ItsSorceryFramework.SorcerySchemaDef.label: Christmas Miracles
ItsSorceryFramework.SorcerySchemaDef.description:
Harnessing the power of 100% pure driven snow, destroy all who would threaten your festivities.

If the urn based pausing annoys you, you can toggle it off in the top left corner of the schemas pawn tab, next to the checkmark.

Due to budget cuts, we were unable to procure a festive image to the right. Subbing in will be a picture of my cat.

ItsSorceryFramework.SorcerySchemaDef.label: Coomsumerism
ItsSorceryFramework.SorcerySchemaDef.description: We were born by the coom, molded by the coom. And now, you shall consume the coom, and flood the world with milk.

ItsSorceryFramework.SorcerySchemaDef.label: Sin Exorcism
ItsSorceryFramework.SorcerySchemaDef.description: Take in the world filth, then purge it internally. By doing so, you cleanse the world.
